short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your browser activity, something you should do!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gatherer is completely FREE, enjoy knowing how much you actually browse.

WHY SHOULD YOU?

🖱️ Clicks: Track every click. Whether you're working browsing your favourite sites or shopping, Gatherer takes your clicks and put them in the popup INSTANTLY.

🔎 Searches: Curious about how many searches? Gatherer patiently wait for your search, collect and display in the popup at the same time providing a clear picture of your interest in the knowledge.

⌨️ Keystrokes: Gatherer is always there listening! Every keystroke counts, and it was never this easy to see EXACTLY how many keys you pressed searching for knowledge.

BECAUSE!

🕵️‍♂️ Privacy and Security: We prioritize your privacy. Gatherer collects data only for your personal insight and never shares your information without consent. Your stats and data remain yours alone.

🥞 User-Friendly Design: The extension is designed to be simple. With one click you are accessing your stats and after all those wasted clicks that should be easy. 

TO KEEP IT GOING!

⭐ Future Enhancements:

This is just the beginning! Depending on user interest, we plan to roll out exciting new features such as:
🚀 Dashboard+ where you will have detailed reports of every year/month/week/day.
📈 Chrome Runtime where you will see EXACTLY the time Google Chrome was in use.
📊 Runtime+ here I plan to give you more options, TIME is important so you have to manage it well and if you work online you definitely NEED this!
🏆 Leaderboards & RANKS, I see it as a place where people can compete at jobs, school even at home to SHOW everyone how much they are in a knowledge advantage!

Your feedback is important! Together we will make the most of Gatherer so make it easy for me as well... Write a review ✍️

🤝 Join the growing community of users who are taking control of their digital LIFE. 
Install Gatherer today and start your well informed journey! 🤝
